name: Dracule Mihawk
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: If your opponent's Leader has the <Slash> attribute, this Leader gains +1000 power. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your cards: If there is a Character with a cost of 5 or more, set up to 3 of your DON!! cards as active. Then, you cannot play Character cards during this turn.
